thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Dealing with, and buying from, Bundle Stars is generally a good experience but the one thing that truly irks me is that it is incredibly time-consuming to determine the contents and prices of their many bundles. Currently, one must open each bundle separately, one at a time, to determine the composition and price of each bundle. To me, this is very off-putting and discourages me from even checking out their bundles. At the very least, and in the interest of not wasting their customers' time and resources, Bundle Stars should display a list of each bundle's contents on the main 'Bundles' page.
